segments.text: This overflowing sink is definitely causing serious damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just soaking into those cabinet doors, it's a terrible sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Think about the warped wood and the potential for mold to grow underneath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding rapidly, making it very slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine someone slipping and getting seriously injured on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a huge mess, and it could have been so easily avoided if only she noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is just running and running, such an incredible waste of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really wish someone would just step in and turn it off immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm, tidy garden outside is stark and upsetting to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is slowly but surely becoming a ruin, and no one is reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster in slow motion, unfolding right before my very eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All those dishes near the sink might end up broken if someone falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly disturbing sight, this level of negligence and unawareness.
segments.speaker: PAR
